content: f using mc or cc work an icord bind off on the ws co 3 stitches using a backwards loop cast on * k2 k2togtbl slip all stitches back to left needle and repeat from * until you have moved your last set of 3 stitches back to the left needle bind off these 3 stitches f i n i s h i n g a n d b l o c k i n g block to finished measurements for your selected size spincycle yarn company suggests steaming to block to prevent bleeding and i suggest the same if you would like to wet block your shawl or simply need to clean it use cool water and a few shout color catchers in your bathtub the larger your water vessel the less damage that can happen if bleeding occurs weave in ends and enjoy share your project on instagram with #daytrippershawl and be sure to tag me @pineneedlesandpoppies h a p p y k n i t t i n g
